name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in backend development and delivering robust, high-performance applications. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and experienced with **Kubernetes**, **GitLab CI**, and **Postgres**. Demonstrated expertise in designing systems using **Clean Architecture**, **DDD** (Domain-Driven Design), and implementing **TDD** (Test-Driven Development) methodologies.
Skilled in integrating **AI/ML** capabilities into applications and applying **Agile** practices to enhance development efficiency. Proven track record in deploying cloud systems on necessary platforms, with a solid understanding of microservices and event-driven architectures, as well as familiarity with tools like **Kafka**. Committed to ensuring compliance with industry standards and enhancing operational workflows.
